greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Squares arising in A039770.
reference: D. M. Burton, Elementary Number Theory, Allyn and Bacon Inc., Boston MA, 1976, p. 141.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
program: (PARI) n=0; for (m=1, 10^5, if (issquare(a=eulerphi(m)), write("b062732.txt", n++, " ", a); if (n==1000, break))) \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 10 2009
results.author: _Jason Earls_, Jul 12 2001
